actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-827.

official_title: Resolved, that the Committee on Rules and Administration is authorized to expend, from the contingent fund of the Senate, not to exceed $153,000, to improve through the use of computers the payroll, personnel, and voucher system of the Senate.  Expenses of the committee under this resolution shall be paid upon vouchers approved by the chairman of the committee.

summary.text: Provides that the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration is authorized to expend, from the contingent fund of the Senate, not to exceed $153,000, to improve through the use of computers the payroll, personnel, and voucher system of the Senate.
